npcLines: Glad you're here, Lin. We've got a situation brewing that needs a delicate touch.

Beebe's Firearms... it's always been a bit rough around the edges, but lately, activity there has been... concerning. More than usual. Whispers of backroom deals, unsavory types coming and going at odd hours.
I need someone to poke around, discreetly. Find out what's really going on with Grayson and Shauna. Are you up for it?

playerChoices.text: I understand, Captain. I'll look into it.
What kind of 'concerning activity' are we talking about?
Sorry, Captain. Sounds too risky for me right now.

npcLines: Increased foot traffic of known lowlifes, hushed conversations that stop when my officers are near... an unusual shipment they tried to hide the other day. Standard stuff for Beebe's, maybe, but the frequency is up. And the FPD has... fewer friends than it used to.
I need actionable intelligence, Lin. Not just rumors.

playerChoices.text: Alright, I'm convinced. I'll take the job.
Still sounds like a pass for me.

npcLines: Good. I knew I could count on you. Report back when you have something solid. And Lin... be careful. We don't know how deep this goes.
Disappointing, but I understand. The FPD doesn't have many resources to offer if things go south. If you change your mind, the offer stands... for now.
